snippet: The co-head of Bank of America Merrill Lynch's Asia mergers and acquisitions team, Michael Cho, has been laid off, a person briefed on the matter told DealBook on Monday.
abstract: The co-head of Bank of America Merrill Lynch's Asia mergers and acquisitions team, Michael Cho, has been laid off, a person briefed on the matter told DealBook on Monday.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Bank of America Lays Off Co-Head of Asia M.&A.
